algorithms.name: Breadth-First Search
algorithms.description: is an algorithm for searching a graph for a node that satisfies a given property. It guarantees a shortest path on a unweighted graph

algorithms.name: Depth-First Search
algorithms.description: is an algorithm for traversing or searching a graph. It doesn't guarantee the shortest path

algorithms.name: Dijkstra's
algorithms.description: is an algorithm for finding the shortest paths between nodes in a graph. It guarantees the shortest path
